skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of attacking all other enemies with a second hit, dealing 30% of the damage inflicted from the first hit.
skills.name: Wild Slashing

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Heals this Champion by 10% of the damage inflicted if this Champion's current HP is below 50%.
skills.name: Insane Resilience
